title: Trump Promised To Crack Down on Illegal Immigration: Why is Everyone So Surprised?
description: Acting shocked by President Trump’s hardline immigration policies, policies he promised throughout his campaign and enforced during both of his presidential administrations, is like pretending Congress just discovered dysfunction, or that water is wet. Many i…
